description: Lists specific permissions of users and groups with access to your Amazon Kendra experience.

parameters.name: Id
parameters.description: The identifier of your Amazon Kendra experience.

parameters.name: IndexId
parameters.description: The identifier of the index for your Amazon Kendra experience.

nested_items.name: SummaryItems
nested_items.description: An array of summary information for one or more users or groups.

nested_items.name: EntityId
nested_items.description: The identifier of a user or group in your IAM Identity Center identity source. For example, a user ID could be an email.

nested_items.name: Persona
nested_items.description: The persona that defines the specific permissions of the user or group in your IAM Identity Center identity source. The available personas or access roles are Owner and Viewer. For more information on these personas, see Providing access to your search page.

nested_items.name: CreatedAt
nested_items.description: The Unix timestamp when the summary information was created.

nested_items.name: UpdatedAt
nested_items.description: The Unix timestamp when the summary information was last updated.

nested_items.name: NextToken
nested_items.description: If the response is truncated, Amazon Kendra returns this token, which you can use in a later request to retrieve the next set of users or groups.
